descriptions.Espresso Motivador: Intense and concentrated coffee served in a small cup. The perfect base for many drinks, with a strong and aromatic flavor.
descriptions.Espresso doble motivador: Double espresso shot for an extra dose of energy.
descriptions.Capuccino con Amor Propio: A perfect balance between espresso, steamed milk, and foam. Creamy, foamy, and with a classic flavor.
descriptions.Americano con Estabilidad: Espresso diluted with hot water. A smoother taste, ideal if you prefer a light but characterful coffee.
descriptions.Macchiato con Humor: Espresso “stained” with a touch of foamed milk. A small, strong, and creamy coffee, served in a small cup.
descriptions.Cortado con Ideas: Espresso with a little hot milk—softer yet still intense.
descriptions.Flat White con Inteligencia: Like a latte but richer in coffee and lighter on foam. Velvety texture and intense flavor.
descriptions.Latte con limites: Espresso with plenty of steamed milk and just a dash of foam. Smooth and creamy.
descriptions.Mocaccino Dopaminérgico: Espresso with steamed milk and chocolate. Sweet, creamy, and irresistibly cocoa-rich.
descriptions.Shot extra: Add an extra shot of espresso to your favorite drink.
descriptions.Leche vegetal: Choose plant-based milk to customize your coffee.
descriptions.Extra Syrup de Avellana: Add a touch of hazelnut syrup.
descriptions.Extra Syrup de Caramel: Add a touch of caramel syrup.
descriptions.Chocotorta con placer: Classic Argentine cake of chocolate cookies, dulce de leche, and cream cheese.
descriptions.Budín de vainilla con resiliencia: Soft vanilla sponge cake, fluffy and aromatic.
descriptions.Brownie con Autocuidado: Dense chocolate square with a molten center—perfect for chocolate lovers.
descriptions.Pie de limón con Validación: Crispy crust, creamy lemon filling, meringue on top—sweet-tart harmony.
descriptions.Alfajor con Apego seguro: Two soft cookies filled with dulce de leche and dusted with powdered sugar.
descriptions.Cheesecake de frutilla con creatividad: Creamy cheesecake on a cookie base, topped with fresh strawberries.
descriptions.Rol de canela con Autoestima: Tender dough swirled with cinnamon sugar, drizzled in glaze.
descriptions.Galletas con chispas de chocolate Analít: Crunchy outside, soft inside, loaded with chocolate chips.
descriptions.Medialuna de manteca con Pasión: Flaky, buttery croissant—brighten your coffee break.
descriptions.Medialuna de jamón y queso con Amor: Soft pastry filled with ham and cheese—warm and savory.
descriptions.Tequeños (6)con Refuerzo Positivo: Six golden cheese-filled sticks—crispy and addictive.
descriptions.Cachito con Regulación: Horn-shaped roll stuffed with ham—a Venezuelan classic.
descriptions.Scon de queso con experiencia: Delicate, fluffy cheese scone with a hint of Parmesan.
descriptions.Tostado de jamón y queso con Imaginación: Crispy toast layered with ham and melted cheese.
descriptions.Pan de chocolate con Impulso: Brioche dough filled with semi-sweet chocolate and topped in chocolate sauce.
descriptions.Frappuccino de Escape emocional: Our frappuccino blends espresso, ice, and milk until silky smooth.
descriptions.Licuado de Ananá con Desahogo: A tropical pineapple smoothie, vibrant and refreshing.
descriptions.Limonada anti estrés: Chilled lemonade with an anti-stress twist—bright and uplifting.
descriptions.Licuado de frutilla Sensorial: Strawberry smoothie, sweet and sensorially lush.
descriptions.Chocolate caliente con Claridad: Hot chocolate that clears the mind with sweet warmth.
descriptions.Té verde con Bienestar: Gentle green tea to nurture well-being.
descriptions.Te negro con Alma: Robust black tea for soulful moments.
descriptions.Té Chai con Paz: Spiced chai with cinnamon, clove, and ginger—calming warmth.
descriptions.Mate cocido con abrazos: Traditional mate cocido—soft, comforting, like home.
descriptions.Magic con energía: Double espresso in a small glass with milk—pure magic.
descriptions.Lungo con ilusión: Single espresso with hot water in a small cup—light illusion.
descriptions.Budín de zanahoria con salud mental: Carrot cake that nourishes both body and mind.
descriptions.Chipa con compañía: Cheesy, crunchy chipa—joy in every bite.
